data.text:
FUN FACT: #Ottawa is home to a famous French culinary arts institution. This means that the city is chock full of amazing chefs and restaurants! 🍝 

Eat your way through #YOW this summer, #flyflair and save with our #lowfares starting in May!

https://t.co/atFTLZHu4Z https://t.co/Jof6gN09qB

We’re baaaaack! 🎉 Service out of @Fly_YJJ begins again in July 2021. Plan your Canadian getaway now and grab our #lowfares to get off the island. See you soon, Victoria! #flyflair

https://t.co/pLRouo5j9J

#YYJ https://t.co/Bw0q6LeCij

ICYMI Charlottetown, we’re coming to your beautiful city, and we’re bringing our #lowfares with us! Jump aboard your Flair flight starting June 2021. 🙌 #flyflair

https://t.co/xnJuUyVxLq

#YYG @flyyyg https://t.co/TE2fqCLLUM

data.text:
Kitchener-Waterloo! Did you hear? 🤔Driving to the big city to catch a Flair flight is now a thing of the past! #flyflair straight from your very own Region of Waterloo International Airport starting this spring! 🎉 #lowfares

https://t.co/YWPFjwlwuZ

#YKF @flyykf https://t.co/djc3mzAEze

The wait is over, Ottawa! We’re bringing our #lowfares to Canada’s capital city starting in May! 🙌 #flyflair

https://t.co/atFTLZHu4Z

#YOW @flyyow https://t.co/WSLvjPvbZQ
ICYMI, there is a lot of excitement around @FlyYKF and we cannot wait! https://t.co/8DW8HCk9gs

Bring your camera and get that perfect shot of Peggy’s Cove. 📸 Fly to #halifax with Flair starting May 2021. #lowfares

#YHZ 
@hfxstanfield

https://t.co/d8RejoIgjX https://t.co/SnQNVXlUM8
